caption.p: Specific PCR detection of begomovirus in individual non-cultivated plants collected from different counties of the five Northern Pacific-regions of Mexico included in this study.

fn.p: 1 Virus acronyms: PHYVV, Pepper huasteco yellow vein virus; TYLCV, Tomato yellow leaf virus; SiMSiV, Sida mosaic Sinaloa virus; RhGMV, Rhynchosia golden mosaic virus; RhGMSV, Rhynchosia golden mosaic Sinaloa virus. 2 ND: Not detected.
